description: Try our easy to follow Strawberry Swirl Cheesecake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: No-bake cheesecake,Strawberry,Seafood free,Low salt,No-bake desserts,Quick & easy dessert
name: Strawberry Swirl Cheesecake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Line base of a 20cm springform tin with baking paper.
Process biscuits in a food processor until fine crumbs. Add butter and process until well combined.
Press firmly over base of tin to cover. Chill while preparing cheese filling.
Sprinkle gelatine over 1/4 cup boiling water and whisk well to dissolve. Set aside.
Trim tops from strawberries. purée half with the icing sugar until smooth. Set aside.

Place cream cheese into food processor and process until smooth. Add condensed milk, vanilla and gelatine mixture and process again until combined. Stir in diced strawberries. Pour mixture over base. Using a teaspoon, drop small dollops of strawberry purée over the mixture. Drag a knife through the purée to give a swirl effect.
Refrigerate for 4 hours or until set.
To serve, remove from tin and cut into wedges. Serve with extra purée and extra strawberries.
